findings.title: Improved Decimal Conversion in depositReserves()
findings.description: The conversion logic in the `depositReserves()` routine is coded incorrectly, leading to potential precision loss.

findings.title: Improved Caller Authentication Of sOlympusERC20::rebase()
findings.description: Authentication issue in `rebase()` function of `sOlympusERC20` contract that needs to be resolved.

findings.title: Potential Rebasing Perturbation
findings.description: The rebasing mechanism implemented in OlympusStaking contract may cause perturbations due to the distribution of accumulated profits to circulating sOHM

findings.title: Simplified Logic In BondingCalculator::_principleValuation()
findings.description: Optimization of internal helper `_principleValuation` can simplify scaling operation.

findings.title: Proper Initialization Enforcement In sOlympus::setStakingContract()
findings.description: The setStakingContract() function in sOlympus contract does not ensure proper initialization enforcement, which can lead to protocol-wide instability.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the OlympusDAO protocol, there is a privileged owner account plays a critical role in governing the treasury contract (`Vault`) and regulating the `OHM` token contract.

findings.title: Redundant Code Removal
findings.description: Unused code or unnecessary redundancies can be safely removed from OlympusERC20 and Vault contracts.
